text:
Question 147) To build a counterpart, it is common, in the constitution of the concrete, to use cement, sand and gravel, in the following proportion: 1 part of cement, 4 parts of sand and 2 parts of gravel. To build a garage counterproof, a construction company ordered a 14 m3 concrete concrete truck.
What is the volume of cement, in m3, in the concrete load brought by the concrete concrete?
A) 1.75
B) 2.00
C) 2.33
D) 4.00
E) 8.00
